TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ExtractTemplateValuesMethod extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The from which to extract name/value pairs, which are passed by the data-bound control to an associated data source control in two-way data-binding scenarios. This parameter corresponds to the `control` parameter passed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%28System.Web.UI.Control%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
Docs.summary: Provides a delegate with which ASP.NET extracts a set of name/value pairs from an object at run time. This class cannot be inherited.
Docs.returns: An of name/value pairs used in two-way, templated data-binding scenarios between ASP.NET data-bound controls and data source controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ExtractTemplateValuesMethod delegate is used by ASP.NET and is not meant to be used directly from your code.
This delegate is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder> class, which is the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> interface that ASP.NET generates when the ASP.NET parser encounters two-way data-binding within templated content.
